title: Lakeview's Rothbort on Kroger: Much Better Buy Than WFM (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Scott Rothbort, President and Founder of Lakeview Asset Management, on Kroger earnings, and the grocer space.
